info.description: This documentation defines the endpoints for https://api.crxcavator.io/v1
info.title: CRXcavator API Docs

delete.summary: Demote a super admin of a group

post.summary: Promote a user to super admin of a group

get.description: Returns all data on a group. Returns group secret and webhook secert if admin.

delete.summary: Removes a user from a group
Removes an extension from the whitelist

parameters.name: extension_id
parameters.description: Extension ID to remove from whitelisted extensions

post.summary: Adds an extension to the whitelist

parameters.name: extension_id
parameters.description: Extension ID to add to whitelisted extensions

get.summary: Gets installed extension data for the user

post.summary: Sets installed extension data for the user

delete.summary: Delete installed extension data for the user

get.summary: Gets installed extension data for the entire group
Get bulk data on all whitelisted & used extensions
get.description: bulk data on all whitelisted & used extensions

get.summary: Get bulk data on all whitelisted extensions
get.description: Returns bulk data on all whitelisted extensions

post.summary: Removes a user from a group
Sets ThreatExchange key for the group
Sets VirusTotal key for the group
Submit an extension ID to be scanned

get.summary: Gets a report on a specific version of an extension
Gets reports for all versions of an extension

secret.description: Group secret generated on the group settings page
Group secret generated on the group settings page

retire.description: RetireJS JSON output object. See https://github.com/RetireJS/retire.js to learn more

VirusTotalReport.description: Array of URLs and VirusTotal API Key
